attributes.title: 5 important ingredients in neutrogena face wash

attributes.description: Derived from the bark of the willow tree, Salicylate has been used for centuries, though primarily for the treatment of fever relief.
attributes.title: Salicylic Acid

attributes.description: Originally called agar-agar, a Malay word for a local seaweed, this seaweed is found all over the world in areas favorable to their growth.
attributes.title: Agar

attributes.description: Neutrogena Grapefruit face Wash ingredients are found all over the world. They are sent to America to be made and sent away to the world.

Camellia Sinensis
attributes.description: Camellia sinensis is the species of plant whose leaves and leaf buds are used to produce Chinese tea.

attributes.title: Mica
attributes.description:
Mica is mined in several areas of the world, but primarily in India. Our company
has close ties with mine owners and Indian suppliers
